hero.description: I build modern web applications with Vue, Nuxt and TypeScript. Passionate about clean code, performance and great user experience.

about.title: About Me
about.description: As a Senior Fullstack Developer focused on the Vue/Nuxt ecosystem, I bring years of experience building scalable web applications. As a Nuxt Ecosystem Member, I actively contribute to the open-source community.

projects.title: Projects & Packages
projects.subtitle: I'm constantly working on new ideas and side projects. Here are the ones that made it into the wild and are being used by the community.

dmHero.name: DM Hero
dmHero.description: Campaign management for Dungeon Masters: NPCs, locations, items, factions, sessions with AI integration and interactive chaos graph.

vormVue.name: vorm-vue
vormVue.description: A flexible and type-safe form validation library for Vue 3 with schema-based validation.

vormNuxt.name: vorm-nuxt
vormNuxt.description: Nuxt module for vorm-vue with auto-import and optimized integration.

lintmon.name: lintmon
lintmon.description: VS Code Extension for real-time linting monitoring and visualization.

nuxtCare.name: nuxt.care
nuxtCare.description: Audit tool for Nuxt modules. Analyze module health, dependencies, and best practices with a simple web interface.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's Connect
contact.description: Interested in working together or just want to say hi? I'd love to hear from you.
